cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.
cards.name: Stroke of Genius
cards.text: Target player draws X cards.

cards.flavor:
"Here sprouted the first seedling of Argoth. Here the last tree will fall."
—Gamelon, Citanul elder
cards.name: Gaea's Cradle
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each creature you control.

cards.flavor:
"Um...oh...what was I saying?"
—Reveka, wizard savant
cards.name: Memory Lapse
cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.

cards.name: Vampiric Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

cards.flavor: "Life, struck sharp on death, Makes awful lightning." - Elizabeth Barrett Browning, "Aurora Leigh"
cards.name: Ball Lightning
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

cards.name: Oath of Druids
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. If he or she does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Hammer of Bogardan
cards.text:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

cards.flavor:
"'Tis a shame, in such a tempest, to have but one anchor."
—Laurence Sterne, Tristram Shandy
cards.name: Tradewind Rider
cards.text:
Flying
{T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Intuition
cards.text: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Argothian Enchantress
cards.text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

cards.name: Living Death
cards.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"'O miserable of happy! Is this the end/ Of this new glorious world... ?'"
—John Milton, Paradise Lost
cards.name: Armageddon
cards.text: Destroy all lands.

cards.name: Balance
cards.text: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

cards.flavor:
"Let's do it again!"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand
cards.name: Time Warp
cards.text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

cards.flavor: They exist to cease.
cards.name: Phyrexian Negator
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.

cards.name: Deranged Hermit
cards.text:
Echo {3}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Deranged Hermit enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.
Squirrel creatures get +1/+1.

cards.flavor: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.
cards.name: Hermit Druid
cards.text: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

cards.name: Gemstone Mine
cards.text:
Gemstone Mine enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it.
{T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.

cards.name: Regrowth
cards.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Sol Ring
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Mishra's Factory
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
{T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"She is a theme of honor and reknown, ...Whose present courage may beat down our foes."
—William Shakespeare, Troilus and Cressida
cards.name: Exalted Angel
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Exalted Angel deals damage, you gain that much life.
Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.flavor: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."
cards.name: Grim Lavamancer
cards.text: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor: Meddling mages chant so loudly that no one can get a spell in edgewise.
cards.name: Meddling Mage
cards.text:
As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, name a nonland card.
The named card can't be cast.

cards.flavor:
"The tyrannous and bloody deed is done, The most arch deed of piteous massacre That ever yet this land was guilty of."
—William Shakespeare, Richard III
cards.name: Pernicious Deed
cards.text: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.

cards.flavor:
"All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive."
—Elvish refugee
cards.name: Ravenous Baloth
cards.text: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.

cards.flavor: The foolish wish for that which they desire. The cunning wish for that which they require.
cards.name: Cunning Wish
cards.text: You may choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Cunning Wish.

cards.name: Yawgmoth's Will
cards.text:
Until end of turn, you may play cards from your graveyard.
If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

cards.flavor: Some convictions are so strong that the world must break to accommodate them.
cards.name: Vindicate
cards.text: Destroy target permanent.

cards.name: Decree of Justice
cards.text:
Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.
Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

cards.name: Orim's Chant
cards.text:
Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)
Target player can't cast spells this turn.
If Orim's Chant was kicked, creatures can't attack this turn.

cards.name: Mind's Desire
cards.text:
Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

cards.name: Demonic Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Goblin Piledriver
cards.text:
Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.)
Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

cards.name: Living Wish
cards.text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Maze of Ith
cards.text: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

cards.name: Stifle
cards.text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

cards.name: Survival of the Fittest
cards.text: {G}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Burning Wish
cards.text: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.

cards.name: Bloodstained Mire
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Flooded Strand
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Polluted Delta
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Polluted Delta: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Windswept Heath
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Wooded Foothills
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Sinkhole
cards.text: Destroy target land.

cards.flavor: ...but the price of Mangaras's freedom was Asmira's life.
cards.name: Natural Order
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Natural Order, sacrifice a green creature.
Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Phyrexian Dreadnought
cards.text:
Trample
When Phyrexian Dreadnought enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice any number of creatures with total power 12 or greater.

cards.name: Thawing Glaciers
cards.text:
Thawing Glaciers enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Return Thawing Glaciers to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

cards.name: Land Tax
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Morphling
cards.text:
{U}: Untap Morphling.
{U}: Morphling gains flying until end of turn.
{U}: Morphling gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{1}: Morphling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Morphling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

cards.flavor: "The land promises nothing and keeps its promise." -Oracle en-Vec
cards.name: Wasteland
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

cards.flavor: A grave is the safest place to store ill-gotten treasures.
cards.name: Entomb
cards.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Sword of Fire and Ice
Vendilion Clique
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

cards.flavor: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.
cards.name: Bitterblossom
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Greatness, at any cost.
cards.name: Dark Confidant
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

cards.name: Doubling Season
cards.text:
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would place one or more counters on a permanent you control, it places twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

cards.flavor: "I wrecked your metal guy, boss. But look! I made you an ashtray."
cards.name: Goblin Welder
cards.text: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

cards.name: Xiahou Dun, the One-Eyed
cards.text:
Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
Sacrifice Xiahou Dun, the One-Eyed: Return target black card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

cards.name: Flusterstorm
cards.text:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

cards.flavor: She protects the sacred groves from blight, drought, and the Unbeholden.
cards.name: Noble Hierarch
cards.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Karmic Guide
cards.text:
Flying, protection from black
Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Sneak Attack
cards.text: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Karakas
cards.text:
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{T}: Return target legendary creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Sword of Light and Shadow

cards.flavor: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.
cards.name: Command Tower
cards.text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.flavor: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.
cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

cards.name: Bribery
cards.text: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Imperial Recruiter
cards.text: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.
cards.name: Crucible of Worlds
cards.text: You may play land cards from your graveyard.

cards.flavor: By the year 208, Cao Cao commanded more than 1,000 experienced generals and a million infantry, cavalry, and naval troops.
cards.name: Overwhelming Forces
cards.text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.

cards.flavor: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."
cards.name: Show and Tell
cards.text: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"I have seen entire civilizations rise and fall. You mortals are but dust to me."
—Sorin Markov
cards.name: Vindicate
cards.text: Destroy target permanent.

cards.flavor:
"First through the Riftstone was Genesis—and the world was lifeless no more."
—Scroll of Beginnings
cards.name: Genesis
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: "Death tried to uncrown me. But now I return, king of a greater realm."
cards.name: Karador, Ghost Chieftain
cards.text:
Karador, Ghost Chieftain costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
During each of your turns, you may cast one creature card from your graveyard.

cards.flavor:
"To examine the causes of life, we must first have recourse to death."
—Mary Shelley, Frankenstein
cards.name: Greater Good
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

cards.name: Riku of Two Reflections
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {U}{R}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}{U}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

cards.name: Force of Will
cards.text:
You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay Force of Will's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

cards.flavor: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."
cards.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
cards.text: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Sword of Feast and Famine

cards.flavor: His enemies wondered if the lich king's brutal death and unnatural rebirth had been his plan all along.
cards.name: Nekusar, the Mindrazer
cards.text:
At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
Whenever an opponent draws a card, Nekusar, the Mindrazer deals 1 damage to that player.

cards.flavor: "The Gitaxians whisper among themselves of other worlds. If they exist, we must bring Phyrexia's magnificence to them."
cards.name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
cards.text:
Vigilance
Other creatures you control get +2/+2.
Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.

cards.name: Oloro, Ageless Ascetic
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life.
Whenever you gain life, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card and each opponent loses 1 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Oloro, Ageless Ascetic is in the command zone, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor:
"Thorn bushes spring up wherever the army has passed. Lean years follow in the wake of a great war."
—Lao Tzu, Tao Te Ching, trans. Feng and English
cards.name: Ravages of War
cards.text: Destroy all lands.

cards.name: Damnation
cards.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."
cards.name: Dualcaster Mage
cards.text:
Flash
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor: "She will come back to me."
cards.name: Feldon of the Third Path
cards.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: The land was left depleted and empty, an unsettling taste of things to come.
cards.name: Wasteland
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

cards.flavor:
"Power is wasted on the weak. They never keep it for long."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Mana Drain
cards.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} to your mana pool equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor:
"I gazed once into that light. Now it burns in my mind, forever denying me rest."
—Riku of Two Reflections
cards.name: Command Beacon
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Command Beacon: Put your commander into your hand from the command zone.
